data>getBoundingBox.yml@135|country.description: Country of interest. For list of countries look here https://geoio.biodiversite-quebec.ca/docs#/default/validate_country_name_validate_country_name_get.
data>getBoundingBox.yml@135|country.label: Country

data>getBoundingBox.yml@135|state.description: State or province of interest (leave blank if you want the full country). For list of accepted region names look here https://geoio.biodiversite-quebec.ca/docs#/default/validate_state_name_validate_state_name_get.
data>getBoundingBox.yml@135|state.label: State/Province

data>getBoundingBox.yml@135|study_area_f.description: Upload a file of a custom study area
data>getBoundingBox.yml@135|study_area_f.label: File for study area

data>loadFromStac.yml@136|collections_it.description: Vector of strings, collection name followed by '|' followed by item id
data>loadFromStac.yml@136|collections_it.label: collections_items

data>loadFromStac.yml@136|weight_matrix_.description: Weight matrix used for BON optimization. Vector of strings, collection name followed by '|' followed by item id, followed by weights. If using the GEO BON Stac catalog, see the list of [available layers here](https://stac.geobon.org/viewer). The collection and item ids can be obtained as the last two parts of the url for each layer (chelsa-clim/bio1). Cannot be used if collection_items is set.
data>loadFromStac.yml@136|weight_matrix_.label: Weight matrix with ids

data>loadFromStac.yml@136|spatial_res.description: Integer, spatial resolution of the rasters
data>loadFromStac.yml@136|spatial_res.label: spatial resolution

data>loadFromStac.yml@136|resampling.description: Resampling method used when rescaling the raster layers. See [gdalwarp](https://gdal.org/en/latest/programs/gdalwarp.html) for description.
data>loadFromStac.yml@136|resampling.label: resampling

data>loadFromStac.yml@136|aggregation.description: Method used to aggregate items that overlay each other
data>loadFromStac.yml@136|aggregation.label: aggregation

data>loadFromStac.yml@136|mask.description: Shapefile, used to mask the output rasters
data>loadFromStac.yml@136|mask.label: mask

pipeline@137.description: Coordinate reference system of the country polygon

TestScript.yml@134|raster_change.label: Raster change

TestScript.yml@134|means_plot.label: Plot of raster means
